title: Riot plez, make a system where 12 yr olds cant play

replies.body: According to the League of Legends Terms of Use, section III, sub-section B 'Eligibility'; "THE SITE AND THE GAME ARE NOT DIRECTED AT CHILDREN UNDER 13 YEARS OF AGE, NOR DOES RIOT GAMES KNOWINGLY COLLECT INFORMATION FROM CHILDREN UNDER 13. IF YOU ARE UNDER 13, PLEASE DO NOT SUBMIT ANY PERSONALLY IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION TO RIOT GAMES", Riot does not support children aged 13 and under (including your twelvies) from playing League of Legends. Unfortunately there is no real way to combat and control the actual age of players who play this game unless Riot required a passport photo as evidence of age. But because of their Terms of Use they cannot obtain such information.
